name: Light up the Darkness
description:
Navigate the darkness and light torches scattered about using the fireball and fireworks projectiles.  Best the two challenges, collect the crystals and unlock the hidden platform in the middle of the area.  That's about all there is for this project.

Credit:

Floor texture - FREE Stylized PBR Textures Pack

Music - Free Music Pack 1

SFX - Flight Magic SFX
